QuestData.Title: Mage-Lord Urom
QuestData.Description: Only one obstacle stands between us and our ultimate goal here. His name is Urom.$b$bHe guards the third ring above us. Beware his powerful conjurings, friend.$b$bBring him down. Make him pay for his treacherous allegiance to the enemy!
QuestData.LogDescription: Belgaristrasz wants you to defeat Mage-Lord Urom in the Oculus.
QuestData.CompletionText: Has Mage-Lord Urom been dealt with?
QuestData.RewardText: Victory is in reach, friend.$b$bFocus, for now comes the true test.
